name: Vegetarian Cottage Cheese Patties
author: ZOPOOH
summary: Delicious addition to any menu. Don't be scared of the name. I hate cottage cheese but love these.
ingredients: 1 (1 ounce) envelope dry onion soup mix
1 (10 ounce) can condensed cream of mushroom soup
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Beat eggs into a large bowl
Stir in cottage cheese, rolled oats, wheat germ, dry onion soup mix, and dried thyme
Heat oil in a skillet over medium heat
Place patties in oil, and brown on both sides
Remove patties to a 9x13-inch baking dish
Pour condensed soup into a small bowl
Stir in 1/2 can of water (or milk) to dilute, then pour over patties
Bake in a preheated oven until the soup is bubbly, about 20 minutes
